name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: net.topology.script.number.args
description:
The max number of args that the script configured with
    net.topology.script.file.name should be run with. Each arg is an
    IP address.

name: fs.s3a.multipart.purge.age
description:
Minimum age in seconds of multipart uploads to purge
    on startup if "fs.s3a.multipart.purge" is true

name: dfs.client.key.provider.cache.expiry
description: DFS client security key cache expiration in milliseconds.

name: dfs.datanode.http.internal-proxy.port
description:
The datanode's internal web proxy port.
    By default it selects a random port available in runtime.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.connect.timeout
description:
Expert: The maximum amount of time (in milli seconds) reduce
  task spends in trying to connect to a remote node for getting map output.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.client.thread-count
description: The number of threads to handle client API requests

name: dfs.block.access.token.lifetime
description: The lifetime of access tokens in minutes.

name: file.client-write-packet-size
description: Packet size for clients to write
